title: The Lodge at Bryce Canyon
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu states eco-friendly and will accommodate special diets. Several vegan choices are available including grilled veggies, grilled portobello, hummus, salads that can be vegan without cheese, in addition to replacing chicken in any dish with Gardein chicken. Sorbet is vegan.
